report.title: Music As a Base
report.author: Troll
report.bodytext: First a little background information about my self. I do not take any medications, I do not have depression, I have been taking this substance for about 3 years on a regular basis. /n /n Setting: Well known area with 2 friends in the house. /n Time: Dropped at 9:00 p.m. /n Mood: above average /n /n I had been taking doses from the 20 - 30 mg range for the last few months and this night I wanted to see if there were any advantages to lower doses. The 20 - 30 range has always produced a high euphoria with please visualizations, but the body load came some times be too much. This night was to be an experiment to see if I could keep the high without the load. I will describe what happened. /n /n 9:00 p.m. Dropped /n /n 9:00 - 11:00 p.m. Slight giddiness but mostly nothing /n /n 11:15 p.m. I noticed that my stomach was getting the usual upset rumbling that it some times gets on foxy. I ate some BK chicken to settle it down. Effects are coming on like other experiences I've had. /n /n 11:30 p.m. I got up to move and enjoy a new poster I got called 'mind warp.' Its a poster with many overlapping circles that, even when sober, tend to move when I try to focus on any one circle. It was definitely going about it's business swirling. I noticed the usual foxy patterns and brightness in colors. My body felt normal. /n /n 1:30 p.m. Still had flowing patterns and brightness in colors. Around midnight I began to think things through much more in depth. Still no overloaded body feelings. /n /n 2:30 p.m. Coming down, should be able to sleep soon. /n /n Overall the night was a success. I am able to lose my self like I normally do on this substance but with much less body load. From now on, I'll be taking lower doses.
